org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore

Interface MetaStoreFilterHook

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorizationMetaStoreFilterHook, DefaultMetaStoreFilterHookImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Apache Sentry (Incubating)")
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface MetaStoreFilterHook
    Metadata filter hook for metastore client. This will be useful for authorization plugins on hiveserver2 to filter metadata results, especially in case of non-impersonation mode where the metastore doesn't know the end user's identity.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • filterCatalog

        default Catalog filterCatalog(Catalog catalog)
                       throws MetaException
        Filter a catalog object. Default implementation returns the passed in catalog.
        Parameters:
        catalog - catalog to filter
        Returns:
        filtered catalog
        Throws:
        MetaException - something bad happened

      • filterCatalogs

        default List<String> filterCatalogs(List<String> catalogs)
                             throws MetaException
        Filter a list of catalog names. Default implementation returns the passed in list.
        Parameters:
        catalogs - list of catalog names.
        Returns:
        filtered list of catalog names.
        Throws:
        MetaException - something bad happened.
